languages.text: "Вольный Торговец? Все чаще рядом с вами меня окутывает сизая дымка". {n}Тоска. Раздражение. Разочарование. Чужие эмоции захлестывают ваше тело, как только Кассия появляется в комнате.{/n} "Ах, простите. Мои силы все еще стремятcя выйти из-под контроля".

traits.locale_text: "Вольный Торговец? Все чаще рядом с вами меня окутывает сизая дымка". {n}Тоска. Раздражение. Разочарование. Чужие эмоции захлестывают ваше тело, как только Кассия появляется в комнате.{/n} "Ах, простите. Мои силы все еще стремятcя выйти из-под контроля".

languages.text: "Rogue Trader? More often than not, whenever I find myself in your presence, greyish-blue mist surrounds me soon afterward." {n}Despondency. Irritation. Disappointment. The moment Cassia enters the room, you feel a wave of emotions that are not your own.{/n} "Ah, I beg your forgiveness. My powers cannot stop trying to break free from my control."
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец? Все чаще рядом с вами меня окутывает сизая дымка". {n}Тоска. Раздражение. Разочарование. Чужие эмоции захлестывают ваше тело, как только Кассия появляется в комнате.{/n} "Ах, простите. Мои силы все еще стремятcя выйти из-под контроля".

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader? More often than not, whenever I find myself in your presence, grey-blue mist surrounds me soon afterward." {n}Despondency. Irritation. Disappointment. The moment Cassia enters the room, you feel a wave of emotions that are not your own.{/n} "Ah, I beg your apology. My powers cannot stop trying to break free from my control."

"Rogue Trader? More often than not, whenever I find myself in your presence, greyish-blue mist surrounds me soon afterward." {n}Despondency. Irritation. Disappointment. The moment Cassia enters the room, you feel a wave of emotions that are not your own.{/n} "Ah, I beg your forgiveness. My powers cannot stop trying to break free from my control."

languages.text: 「自由開拓者様？意図せず{name}様を前にするといつも、ほどなくして青灰色の霧があたくしを囲むんです」{n}落胆。焦燥。失望。カシアが部屋に入った瞬間、あなたは自分のものではない感情の波に襲われる。{/n}「ああ、お許しください。力があたくしの制御を逃れようとするのを止められないのです」
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader? More often than not, whenever I find myself in your presence, greyish-blue mist surrounds me soon afterward." {n}Despondency. Irritation. Disappointment. The moment Cassia enters the room, you feel a wave of emotions that are not your own.{/n} "Ah, I beg your forgiveness. My powers cannot stop trying to break free from my control."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者様？意図せず{name}様を前にするといつも、ほどなくして青灰色の霧があたくしを囲むんです」{n}落胆。焦燥。失望。カシアが部屋に入った瞬間、あなたは自分のものではない感情の波に襲われる。{/n}「ああ、お許しください。力があたくしの制御を逃れようとするのを止められないのです」

languages.text: “行商浪人？每当我出现在你面前的时候，都会很快被灰蓝色的雾气包围。”{n}消沉、烦躁、失望……卡西娅刚刚进入房间，你就感觉到心中涌起一股并不属于你的情绪。{/n}“啊，我很抱歉，我的力量总是打算摆脱我的控制。”
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader? More often than not, whenever I find myself in your presence, greyish-blue mist surrounds me soon afterward." {n}Despondency. Irritation. Disappointment. The moment Cassia enters the room, you feel a wave of emotions that are not your own.{/n} "Ah, I beg your forgiveness. My powers cannot stop trying to break free from my control."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人？每当我出现在你面前的时候，都会很快被灰蓝色的雾气包围。”{n}消沉、烦躁、失望……卡西娅刚刚进入房间，你就感觉到心中涌起一股并不属于你的情绪。{/n}“啊，我很抱歉，我的力量总是打算摆脱我的控制。”

languages.text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande} ? Quand je suis en votre présence, je finis souvent entourée d'une brume bleu-gris. » {n}Découragement. Agacement. Déception. À l'instant où Cassia entre dans la pièce, vous êtes {mf|submergé|submergée} par une vague d'émotions qui ne sont pas les vôtres.{/n} « Ah, pardonnez-moi. Mes pouvoirs ont la fâcheuse tendance de se soustraire à mon contrôle. »
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader? More often than not, whenever I find myself in your presence, greyish-blue mist surrounds me soon afterward." {n}Despondency. Irritation. Disappointment. The moment Cassia enters the room, you feel a wave of emotions that are not your own.{/n} "Ah, I beg your forgiveness. My powers cannot stop trying to break free from my control."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande} ? Quand je suis en votre présence, je finis souvent entourée d'une brume bleu-gris. » {n}Découragement. Agacement. Déception. À l'instant où Cassia entre dans la pièce, vous êtes {mf|submergé|submergée} par une vague d'émotions qui ne sont pas les vôtres.{/n} « Ah, pardonnez-moi. Mes pouvoirs ont la fâcheuse tendance de se soustraire à mon contrôle. »

languages.text: «¿Comerciante Independiente? Muy a menudo, cada vez que me hallo en su presencia, no tarda en envolverme una neblina azul grisácea» {n}Abatimiento. Irritación. Decepción. Tan pronto Cassia entra en la habitación, experimentas una oleada de emociones que no son tuyas.{/n} «Ah, le ruego que me perdone. Mis poderes se muestran muy procaces en sus intentos por escapar a mi control».
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader? More often than not, whenever I find myself in your presence, greyish-blue mist surrounds me soon afterward." {n}Despondency. Irritation. Disappointment. The moment Cassia enters the room, you feel a wave of emotions that are not your own.{/n} "Ah, I beg your forgiveness. My powers cannot stop trying to break free from my control."

traits.locale_text: «¿Comerciante Independiente? Muy a menudo, cada vez que me hallo en su presencia, no tarda en envolverme una neblina azul grisácea» {n}Abatimiento. Irritación. Decepción. Tan pronto Cassia entra en la habitación, experimentas una oleada de emociones que no son tuyas.{/n} «Ah, le ruego que me perdone. Mis poderes se muestran muy procaces en sus intentos por escapar a mi control».

languages.text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}? Wenn ich in Eurer Nähe bin, umgibt mich danach sehr oft ein grau-blauer Nebel." {n}Abhängigkeit. Gereiztheit. Enttäuschung. Sobald Cassia den Raum betritt, spürst du eine Welle von Emotionen, die nicht die deinen sind.{/n} "Ah, ich bitte um Eure Vergebung. Meine Kräfte versuchen immer wieder, sich von meiner Kontrolle zu befreien."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader? More often than not, whenever I find myself in your presence, greyish-blue mist surrounds me soon afterward." {n}Despondency. Irritation. Disappointment. The moment Cassia enters the room, you feel a wave of emotions that are not your own.{/n} "Ah, I beg your forgiveness. My powers cannot stop trying to break free from my control."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}? Wenn ich in Eurer Nähe bin, umgibt mich danach sehr oft ein grau-blauer Nebel." {n}Abhängigkeit. Gereiztheit. Enttäuschung. Sobald Cassia den Raum betritt, spürst du eine Welle von Emotionen, die nicht die deinen sind.{/n} "Ah, ich bitte um Entschuldigung. Meine Kräfte versuchen immer wieder, sich von meiner Kontrolle zu befreien."

languages.text: "Sen mi geldin Hür Tacir? Genelde ne zaman kendimi yanında bulsam çok geçmeden etrafımı grimsi mavi renkli bir sis sarıyor." {n}Ümitsizlik. Kızgınlık. Hayal kırıklığı. Cassia odaya girer girmez onun hissettiği duyguların esiri oluyorsun.{/n} "Pardon, kusuruma bakma. Güçlerim sürekli hâkimiyetimden kurtulmaya çalışıp duruyor."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader? More often than not, whenever I find myself in your presence, greyish-blue mist surrounds me soon afterward." {n}Despondency. Irritation. Disappointment. The moment Cassia enters the room, you feel a wave of emotions that are not your own.{/n} "Ah, I beg your forgiveness. My powers cannot stop trying to break free from my control."

traits.locale_text: "Sen mi geldin Hür Tacir? Sıklıkla ne zaman kendimi yanında bulsam, çok geçmeden etrafımı grimsi mavi renkli bir sis sarıyor." {n}Ümitsizlik. Kızgınlık. Hayal kırıklığı. Cassia odaya girer girmez, bir başkasının duyguları kaplıyor içini.{/n} "Pardon, kusuruma bakma. Güçlerim daima hâkimiyetimden kurtulmaya çalışıp duruyor."
